metadata.title: CVE-2020-35628 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A code execution vulnerability exists in the Nef polygon-parsingfunctionality of CGAL libcgal CGAL-5.1.1. An oob read vulnerability existsin Nef_S2/SNC_io_parser.h SNC_io_parser::read_sloop() slh->incident_sface.An attacker can provide malicious input to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: cgal package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
